name: Cabbage and Basil Salad
keywords: basil, cabbage, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 4 cloves garlic, peeled, crushed and chopped fine (1 tablespoon)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cabbage in half and remove the center rib. Shred as you would for coleslaw. You should have about 6 to 7 cups of lightly packed cabbage.

For the dressing, combine the garlic, salt, pepper, mustard, vinegar and olive oil in a bowl, stirring with a whisk. Add the cabbage and stir. Just before serving, sprinkle the basil on top. The salad will develop more taste if made a few hours ahead.
